text:
Hey <@U041Z71H30V>,

The `hs fetch` command requires as a minimum the `src` (path to the folder/file in your design manager) and then you can pass optional flags (options) such as `--overwrite` afterwards.

For example, if you were trying to fetch a module called `logo-slider.module` from the design manager, you would copy the path in the design manager (right-click > copy path) and then use the following command:
```hs fetch /modules/local/logo-slider.module /modules/local/logo-slider.module --overwrite```
The `dest` (2nd parameter) is optional, if you're in that current working directory and of course - your folder structure may differ from my example so, make sure to point to the correct location(s).

Hope this helps :slightly_smiling_face:
Thank you!! This is enormously helpful!
Npnp, shout if you have any other questions :slightly_smiling_face:
